name: Blossom Whisper 花语
summary: Welcome to "Blossom Whisper," a MR game designed for Meta Quest VR glasses, offering a journey of art, beauty, and self-discovery. This game simplifies complexity, transforming gestures and breaths into displays of love and beauty. Your movements awaken a dance of enchanting flowers, connecting you with nature's gentle forces. More than a game, "Blossom Whisper" is a soulful exploration, encouraging genuine self-expression and exploration.
